title: Breville the Juice Fountain Plus # JE98XL Review
text:
Pros

Excellent at extracting juice from carrots and apples

Easy to use, assemble, and disassemble

Large feed chute accommodates a whole apple

Easy to clean by hand and most parts are dishwasher safe

Excellent owner’s manual

Cons

Does a poor job extracting juice from kale

Expensive

4 5

With the exception of juicing leafy greens, the Breville the Juice Fountain Plus is as good as it gets. It's fast to juice, easy to use, and does a superb job at extracting liquid from carrots or apples. It has a wide feed chute and is among the easiest models to clean by hand, too.

Manufacturer's Warranty: Limited one year

Reviewed: March 2013

Price When Reviewed: $199.99
description: With the exception of juicing leafy greens, the Breville the Juice Fountain Plus is as good as it gets
